question: In 18th century, the Ijara system of land revenue collection was first intrdouced in which of the following regions?
explanation: Murshid Quli Khan established an efficient administration. His important achievement was in the field of revenue administration. He introduced ijara system by which contracts were given for collection of revenue. In the second or third generation, these contractors or ijaradars came to be called as zamindars. He thus created a landed aristocracy in Bengal whose position was confirmed by Lord Cornwallis.
